short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly fill a form on any website in some clicks only. You can also make notes or text draft without leaving browser window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It makes filling a form on any website easy and quick.
You can store any form data to fill on any website .
It shows a widget on screen when user clicks extension action.
From there you can copy any input value with singe click
and fill it anywhere on that page.
User can also make a note of any text draft of email, cover letter etc. for
using it later in extension popup.
